Members.name: Bind
Members.summary: Create an endpoint for accepting connections and bind it to the current socket.
Members.param: A string consisting of a transport and an address, formatted as transport://address.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Connect
Members.summary: Connect the current socket to the specified endpoint.
Members.param: A string consisting of a transport and an address, formatted as transport://address.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Receive1
Members.summary: Receive a message from a remote socket.
Members.returns: A object containing the data recieved and the operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Send1
Members.summary: Queue a message to be sent by the socket.
Members.param: An array of type that contains the message to be sent.
A bitwise combination of the values.
Members.returns: A value indicating the send operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.
